name: perflite
description: ```mermaid graph TD     A[SDK Core] --> B[指标采集模块]     A --> C[数据上报模块]     A --> D[可视化模块]     B --> B1(Performance API)     B --> B2(LongTask API)     B --> B3(Error Tracking)     C --> C1(节流控制)     C --> C2(批量上报)     C --> C3(失败重试)     D --> D1(火焰图)     D --> D2(时间轴)     D --> D3(指标仪表盘) ```
